A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely brilliant movie!! I loved every moment. The visuals are spectacular the story is great and yet again the cast does an amazing job. Rian Johnson did a great job in my opinion\, John Williams Score was yet again beautiful and was put in the film perfectly\, and action sequences  was spectacular. I personally don't get the hate\, I found the character of Rose was good\, the comedy worked and Luke's story was very believable. I know a lot wanted nostalgia seeing Luke as the great hero again and I would have too but I get why they changed the way he is from what happened in those previous years. Overall \"The Last Jedi\" is pure escapism at its best.. Highly Recommend.
